display_long_description:
SWARM 2, the highly anticipated sequel to NYX's "BEST META QUEST VR GAME"  is an electrifying rogue-like shooter. 

With epic new environments, intoxicating rogue-like progression, and globally competitive leaderboards - this is what VR is really made for!


**RECLAIM A WORLD OVERRUN**

As Marv, the last surviving grapple commando, you’ll use your trusty pistol and grappling hook to battle back the Swarm and save Earth - with style! - while growing stronger and unraveling more of the story with each unique mission to the surface. [media]


**TRANSFORM INTO A LEGENDARY HERO**

With Auggie's help, harness revolutionary Shard Tech to permanently upgrade your skills. Choose among dozens of perks to find the perfect combination and turn the tide of war.[media]



**BUILT FOR REPLAYABILITY**

Every mission brings unexpected challenges as you navigate through the neon-lit ruins of Earth, now a constantly changing battleground. Each encounter with the Swarm is a unique experience, with tactics and strategies evolving to match your growing skills. [media]

**SIGNATURE SMOOTH GRAPPLING SYSTEM**

Swarm’s Signature Smooth Grappling System turns you into a dynamic pendulum; master the art of building momentum by swooping close to the ground and timing your swings to perfection.  [media]

Intense. Demanding. Exhilarating.

**This is SWARM 2.**



[media]

With epic new environments, intoxicating rogue-like progression, and globally competitive leaderboards - this is what VR is really made for!


**RECLAIM A WORLD OVERRUN**

As Marv, the last surviving grapple commando, you’ll use your trusty pistol and grappling hook to battle back the Swarm and save Earth - with style! - while growing stronger and unraveling more of the story with each unique mission to the surface. ![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031569_1159677598472976_810858379197661666_n.mp4?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=UWx1CK8ZPv0Q7kNvwGTsbzy&_nc_oc=AdmdB4p8nds_b2PygVPTmg8QYZXpnvtnaRhwTV250xNbUEx6tYm9r-W-xEswwH2J0g4&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=52UxC5rPLGBdxqx1MtqbDg&oh=00_AfpcrLhxtJkXTr_hnkATGQdBh1fK-1dEHiK6HrwAndezAw&oe=695D32D6)


**TRANSFORM INTO A LEGENDARY HERO**

With Auggie's help, harness revolutionary Shard Tech to permanently upgrade your skills. Choose among dozens of perks to find the perfect combination and turn the tide of war.![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75439601_1283604596339092_1626885398679824555_n.mp4?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=oP981XLGsc8Q7kNvwEE8quT&_nc_oc=Adm2V4aUejxc83MJvQTUOC8XTuSF-JY4ikhXSlnZgMVOGccdNkWjjxDzka4154goNsU&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=52UxC5rPLGBdxqx1MtqbDg&oh=00_Afq7W-WZnicHetzgQkyklv8lL2C5qAu34XVjHi9hKp8cYQ&oe=695D3EEC)

Every mission brings unexpected challenges as you navigate through the neon-lit ruins of Earth, now a constantly changing battleground. Each encounter with the Swarm is a unique experience, with tactics and strategies evolving to match your growing skills. ![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982547_414026104680350_1590790586923082496_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=_9j4SxkEsSgQ7kNvwH4bkEG&_nc_oc=Admenru0MPgtGMmZT5dOqKBBa79yRqRI-7WJTfdmlC0NHZVRqA-cu8XVNXK8UBTW9Bk&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=52UxC5rPLGBdxqx1MtqbDg&oh=00_Afr7ZWhfb8RP0LDO3hf_SYgSCIq3srel6kg3l7FwtNaWGA&oe=695D2A72)

Swarm’s Signature Smooth Grappling System turns you into a dynamic pendulum; master the art of building momentum by swooping close to the ground and timing your swings to perfection.  ![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/57569452_1204316914209794_1314769465083168968_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=PyLOKsYLEVEQ7kNvwGOaY6d&_nc_oc=AdlHZGfR0UySzCuj0k1nfwx1-L-q8kn8h_Fv-WjUk6RJyt0u2fLZv5jdmZR9OhTtU1M&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=52UxC5rPLGBdxqx1MtqbDg&oh=00_AfodBhMeF5ZVnt4oF3-AeUmkmuy70UlEqxV96p6A_AGYEw&oe=695D2C8C)

Intense. Demanding. Exhilarating.

**This is SWARM 2.**
